name: Proxy of Nozdormu
tooltip:
Proxy of Nozdormu
Item Level 60
Binds when picked up
Unique
Use: Target a friendly player to deputize them as an Agent of Nozdormu. As an Agent of Nozdormu, only you and your deputies may take the Silithid Carapace Fragments from the corpses of the silithid. Keep your badge in your pack at all times.
"Bears the Seal of the Bronze Flight"
